description:
George Latimer was recruited by AIPAC to challenge Bowman, a member of the Squad who has called for a Gaza ceasefire.

The post AIPAC Is the Largest Donor, By Far, to Jamaal Bowman’s Primary Challenger appeared first on The Intercept.
title: AIPAC Is the Largest Donor, By Far, to Jamaal Bowman’s Primary Challenger

description:
A federal judge dismissed a lawsuit against Biden but implored his administration to reconsider its “unflagging support” for Israel’s war on Gaza.

The post After Historic Ruling, Lawyers Vow to Keep Fighting Biden Over Complicity in Gaza Genocide appeared first on The Intercept.
title: After Historic Ruling, Lawyers Vow to Keep Fighting Biden Over Complicity in Gaza Genocide

description:
At a closed-door fundraiser, Bhavini Patel told donors she was strategizing to get Republicans to vote against Lee in the Democratic primary.

The post Summer Lee’s Primary Opponent Wants Pro-Israel and Hindu Supporters to Take Down the Squad appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Summer Lee's Primary Opponent Wants Pro-Israel and Hindu Supporters to Take Down the Squad

description:
In a letter, more than 1,000 of Goldman’s constituents condemned him for lambasting charges of genocide against Israel at the International Court of Justice.

The post Rep. Dan Goldman’s “Disgust” at South Africa’s Genocide Case Is Costing Him Votes appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Rep. Dan Goldman’s “Disgust” at South Africa’s Genocide Case Is Costing Him Votes
